channel.title: Wheat Brain on Craigccfl
channel.description: Recent content in Wheat Brain on Craigccfl

item.title: We lost our minds to wheat
item.description: This paper, purely hypothetical, but interesting none the less, by Stanton, J (2019)., published in the Journal of Evolution and Health, titled, Voices of the Gods: How we lost our minds to agriculture, purposes to explain our addiction to wheat and the effect wheat has on our minds. To get a better grasp of the author’s theory, I’d recommend visiting the wiki pages and read a few paragraphs on the subject of bicameralism physiology, at least look it up in Merriam-Webster.
